title: New Gameplay Trailer Revealed
excerpt: A stunning new trailer shows off the game's combat and exploration systems.
content:
The developers released a new trailer today, giving us the best look yet at the game. You can watch it right here:

The trailer showcases several new environments and highlights the fluid, combo-based combat system that players can look forward to.
